name: Escape (itch) (ijxmes)
description:
If low fps you can download exe file // sry  Escape Game Overview In this game, the player must find a way to get Jack out of here. There will be hints at various locations.  And mysterious things will chase you choose carefully.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story This the story of Jack was tricked into delivering books to a house where the owner of the house was a Cthulhu cult  He goes through some weird things when he steps foot inside the house and whether he survives depends on you (not always going forward).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to Play WASD - Movement E - Interact LShift - Sprint Must time it well and escape.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Reference H. P.
